title: Deployment - Execute M365 Migration
description: A technician is performing the cutover migration from a client's on-premise Exchange server to Microsoft 365 over a weekend.

tasks.description: Run the final synchronization of mailboxes from the on-premise server to Microsoft 365.
tasks.expected_outcome: All mailbox data is successfully synced to the cloud.

tasks.description: Update the client's public DNS records (MX, SPF, DKIM) to point to Microsoft 365 instead of the on-premise server.
tasks.expected_outcome: Mail flow is successfully redirected to the cloud.

tasks.description: Run post-migration scripts to reconfigure users' Outlook profiles on Monday morning.
tasks.expected_outcome: End-users can access their email on Monday with minimal disruption.
